about_the_game:
Introduction


You've been a bad girl. Now it's time to become even worse.

After spending six months locked up in a juvenile detainment facility, you enter the decaying metropolis of Swinster City with one goal in mind: revenge. The man who killed your brother in cold blood has ascended through the ranks of the underworld to become a powerful crime lord who runs most of the city. To have any hope of taking him down, you'll need to become stronger by any means necessary.

Attend classes at school to learn new skills. Find a part-time job to earn extra cash. Make friends with your classmates and help the local citizens to gain new allies. You can choose to walk the path of justice, or cause as much mayhem as possible. Your decisions will shape the future of the city and determine the fates of everyone around you.

Features


★ Strengthen Your Body and Mind

Work your way through any or all of six different school courses to gain experience and unlock new skills. Hit the gym for a sparring session, or beat down roaming thugs to hone your combat abilities. Learn how to craft raw materials into an armory of unique weapons. You'll need every possible advantage against the hordes of sadistic foes standing in your way.

★ Delve Into a Bustling Urban Jungle

Explore the streets of Swinster City entirely at your own pace. A dynamic day/night cycle will take the city from lively mornings brimming with commuters to a pulse-pounding nightlife scene where the glow of neon signs beckons you to misbehave. Complete a variety of optional missions to gain favor with the locals, or venture into shady alleys and abandoned buildings crawling with gang members who all want you dead. You never know what valuable items your enemies might be hoarding.

★ Make New Friends Along the Way

Meet a diverse cast of colorful characters who can lend a hand when you need it most. Whether they're aiding you in battle or uncovering the details of a vast citywide conspiracy, your allies will prove invaluable on your quest for vengeance. Some of them might even become potential love interests...

★ Choose Your Own Destiny

Save your hard-earned money for useful supplies, or blow it on champagne in a fancy nightclub. Get wasted and participate in underground bar fights, assault innocent pedestrians, or destroy vending machines and ATMs to plunder their contents—just don't expect the police to sit idly by during your rampage. The decisions you make have lasting consequences. Will you fight for justice and defend the downtrodden, or become the ultimate delinquent and declare war on law and order?
